name: YouTube Numix Theme
description: A Dark YouTube Numix Theme to use in Ubuntu. Work best with Numix GTK+ theme. The Original theme (Thanks to Draxx7): https://userstyles.org/styles/92164/youtube-lights-out-a-dark-youtube-theme The Numix GTK+ Theme (Thanks to the Numix Team): https://github.com/numixproject/numix-gtk-theme
additional_info: This theme is the modified version of the theme Lights Out. Link to the original author above. To use this theme, simply install it. I'd recommend you to go to YouTube homepage, click the Chrome Menu button, select More tools and then click Add to desktop. Make sure to check the Open as Window checkbox. After that click Add and you are done. Enjoy the awesome theme!
